Blog.post: hiii everybody... its me..kelvin lim e mopengzzz!! i realli think tat our class is veri slack now... wit all those defience & gettin into trouble wit lot of teachers & students..... hAiz.... but tats our life... hahahaha.... although theres always scolding in e class by e teachers.... i had nvr been sad or lonely in e class before.... i had been happy seeing our class so united wit our big brother & our da jie da.... dao wei & evelyn.... now now... i had a lot of things to say abt e guys in e class... hahaha!!! lets start....~~ firstly there is dao wei... our big bro... i think tat he is a realli niceee guy hahaha.... and a realli good stead to be wit (onli refering to tis year la).... he will always be e one to settle most of e problems in 3/5 becoz he had e ""abilty"" to do so.... hahaa.... although sometimes he can become super & i mean super LAME........~~ secondly there is wen yao.... he arzzz... ermz... dotssss..... lalala.... suan lerx... no comments...~~ then there r e malays.... hakkim is a realli nice guy but smtimes he can become veri scary.... especially when he is mad.... but hes a nice guy to be wit... veri caring and hab e malay accent & style... & btw did i mention he was a gd guitarist & a heavy metal band members.... then ruzhadi.... hahaha.... nice guy when he is quiet onli.... erm... can say him as e joker of our class.... hab a good sense of humor & a veri sharp mouth in insulting f***ing ppl.... hahaha.... recent victim is calvin leung.... e siewmai....hahaha.....arh.... hisham.... haahaha.... all i can say is typically a guai kia(nerd in short).... hahaaha... adi.... erm hes a veri quiet & dunno how to talk swiftly back at others when he is insulted or tease... hmm... thinkin to tis.. he should realli learn more from me.... hahaha!!! ~~ lester chee.... nice fren... change alot ever since step into 3/5.... in a good way.... & yeS... he can win e trophy for e lamest person in e whole class... ahahaha.... okie la.. hes a realli kapo & nosy fellow.... he will noe abt everything else a gal noes... hahahaha dats wat makes him gay.... and pls for e sake of god stop wearing contact.... its damn gay on u dey!!! ~~ hmm next in list will be peter khoo.... airrrporkkkkk... a veri carin guy fer gals la... hahaha.... been veri nice to eunice.... or izzit e other way round... hahaha... plae good basketball... dun see him short short.... power kea.... airrrrporkkk poWER!!~~ okie its lame... phua junnie... stilla typical camel... dunno y i been hearin bad things abt him lately.... hahahaha.... but still a nice fren to me... dun plae plae kea... fren since primary school... but still a word of advice... dun be too flirt.... later all e gals dun wan u den u will feel e pain.... haha~~ clifford see... hahaaha... farnie man... tis one betta still.... fren since kindergarden... hahaaha.... veri farnie & noe how to make ppl cheer up... but i think he will be e next wei yu.... scold and insult ppl lik ants liddat.... damn scary... all future cadets... watch out fer him... hahaha~~ huang peng.... veri shuai to me but too blur liao.... i am glad he was influence by some of my xia lan ness and hab change alot recently to a more farnie and a noisy person liao... cool la but still dunno how to jio gals... wasted... even ng jiao can y u cannot... hahaha~~ ng jia hao.... hahaha... cannot touch face cannot touch dick or else u will see e chair stuck in yur stomach e next min... ahahaha... now trying hard to jio a gal call christy... dunno jio de dao ma... but jia you... u can do it.... si bai lerx bu yao qi nei... ~~ colin tang.... hahahaa!!! i noe yur greatest secret... ahaha... oh... before u touch his things u realli hab to ask fer his permission... oor else u will see e fire burnin in his eyes.... hahaha...nice fren to be wit~~ julius chen... even though not from our class derx but still i treat him as one... hahahaha.... ermx... a veri veri veri veri nice stead.... hes been realli good to natasha tis few months... i think tis onli e beginnin.... their relation ship bond is strong.... i can tell btw they talk and ....... ~~ vivien lee.... hahaha..... all i can say is shes a veri nice person.... but sumtimes can be veri lame.... always foolin around wit cheryl and her bunch of fantastic frens... ahaha jux jokin...nice character... and dun expect much from frens... btw shes still single.... ahahahaha..... any guys lik can jio... but if its fer fun... tat guy will feel e strength of 3/5!!! hahaAAA~~ jieshi... all i can say is a humannities freak... ahahah... study 3 humanities... crazy... ahaha... good fren to be wit....hahaha... insult ppl without u noeing... ahahaha~~ charlotte thompson... went to australia to study.... veri australian.... a nice australian gal la... hahaha... or izzit england....!! seela i messed up liao la....~~ CHARLOTTE WONG.....hahaha.... my stead... wonder wat she sees in me.... haahah.. a realli nice gal and veri carin... but dun dare to show it becoz well maybe becoz of shyness or other reason... i realli dunno.... although its been almost a year i still find her a mystery... always dunno when she need me or when she dun need.... but nevertheless.... my love fer her is still there... no matter rain or shine.... no matter its weekdays or weekends.... i will still luv u derx... hanna... i noe veri mushy la.... ~~ as fer the other ppl.... pls stay tune fer e next chapter of kelvin introduction....=_=`` good luck fer yur studies and frens forever...( not refering to charlotte cause its lover ma....)=_=!!

tis is goin to be short kea.... e truth is i am feelin damn fuck up useless..... thought of suicide before..... y is god so unfair.... isnt everbody suppose to be equal.... sob..... wat e fuck is happening...... i dun recongnize anyone anymore lerx.... feeling so fuck up now.... jux hope i will juz fade away.... had i realli always been a nusiance in everyones life..... sob.... i am damn confused now.... dunno who to talk... suddenly there was no one i could trust..... no one..... not even my parents..... sob....
